name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: That Time I Got Reincarnated Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle That Time I Got Reincarnated wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Switch between random That Time I Got Reincarnated backgrounds or set favorites in the wallpaper control panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links for easy access to emails and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Convenient access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Add sites to the Shortcut panel for quick navigation.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Quick link to explore More Themes.
12. Share easily to social media platforms.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. One-click access to start playing games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your That Time I Got Reincarnated new tab.
